comment.text: "This is a general subtitle used throughout the application. It will appear as the title of certain settings pages and dialogs, providing context to users navigating developer tools."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation 'الترجمة' (Al-Tarjama) translates to 'Translation', not 'Subtitle'. While related, it's not the direct equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more accurate translation for 'Subtitle', such as 'عنوان ثانوي' (Unwan Thanawi) or 'شرح' (Sharh), depending on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation 'Podnadpis' typically translates to 'Subheading' rather than 'Subtitle'. While semantically related, 'Subtitle' refers to text appearing beneath a video or audio, whereas 'Podnadpis' refers to a heading under a main heading.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Titulky' or 'Popisky' for a more accurate translation of 'Subtitle'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian (Cyrillic) translation 'Титл' is not the most accurate translation of 'Subtitle'. While it's related to 'title,' 'subtitle' specifically refers to text displayed beneath a main title.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Натпис испод наслова' (Natpis ispod naslova) which translates to 'Caption below the title' or 'Subtitle' more accurately. 'Легенда' (Legenda) could also be suitable in certain contexts, referring to captions or text explanations.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian (Latin) translation 'Titl' is a valid word but doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Subtitle'. 'Subtitle' refers to the text displayed at the bottom of a screen, typically in movies or videos. 'Titl' in Serbian can mean 'title' which isn't the same.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Napis pod tekstom' or 'Tekst ispod' for a more accurate translation. A more precise single word translation might require more context.
